title: This is not my email!
body: Ok, I want to change my email so I can get the notification that I got in the alpha testing of the new client, but it seems someone either hacked my profile and changed it, or one of my brother's wacky emails. I showed it to him and he says "That is not mine. I have no idea." Is there any way I can change my email without having a verification code from the email that isn't mine?

replies.body: Account security is important to everyone, so we have some resources to help with email verification.  In addition to the verification confirmation email, you can also reach out to us in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to help.  You may need to verify ownership of the account to prove you are the owner, so I recommend using the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help prepare.  Our account team will respond to your ticket as soon as they can!
